<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Set the last DIE/CU a context was seen in and, possibly invalidate the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// context if it is ambiguous.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// In the current implementation, we don&#39;t handle overloaded functions well,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// because the argument types are not taken into account when computing the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// DeclContext tree.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Some of this is mitigated byt using mangled names that do contain the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// arguments types, but sometimes (e.g. with function templates) we don&#39;t have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that. In that case, just do not unique anything that refers to the contexts</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// we are not able to distinguish.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If a context that is not a namespace appears twice in the same CU, we know</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// it is ambiguous. Make it invalid.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343ac101058e7ea21bbbf2a5ac893088e90b">Tag</a> != dwarf::DW&#95;TAG&#95;enumeration&#95;type &amp;&amp; NameRef.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a2dc80c585ad5882da8cae7b5968f7e74">empty</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointerintpair">PointerIntPair&lt;DeclContext &#42;, 1&gt;</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Line = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ByteSize = std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;::max();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!InClangModule) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Gather some discriminating data about the DeclContext we will be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// creating: File, line number and byte size. This shouldn&#39;t be necessary,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because the ODR is just about names, but given that we do some</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// approximations with overloaded functions and anonymous namespaces, use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// these additional data points to make the process safer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is disabled for clang modules, because forward declarations of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// module-defined types do not have a file and line.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ByteSize = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#ae150cb3561ce0a2979ed60d29301eef7">dwarf::toUnsigned</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a>.find(dwarf::DW&#95;AT&#95;byte&#95;size),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;::max());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343ac101058e7ea21bbbf2a5ac893088e90b">Tag</a> != dwarf::DW&#95;TAG&#95;namespace || IsAnonymousNamespace) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FileNum =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">              <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#ae150cb3561ce0a2979ed60d29301eef7">dwarf::toUnsigned</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a>.find(dwarf::DW&#95;AT&#95;decl&#95;file), 0)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;LT = U.getOrigUnit().getContext().getLineTableForUnit(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">                &amp;U.getOrigUnit())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: dsymutil-classic compatibility. I&#39;d rather not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unique anything in anonymous namespaces, but if we do, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// verify that the file and line correspond.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsAnonymousNamespace)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">            FileNum = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LT-&gt;hasFileAtIndex(FileNum)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Line = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#ae150cb3561ce0a2979ed60d29301eef7">dwarf::toUnsigned</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a>.find(dwarf::DW&#95;AT&#95;decl&#95;line), 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Cache the resolved paths based on the index in the line table,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because calling realpath is expensive.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">            FileRef = getResolvedPath(U, FileNum, &#42;LT);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Line &amp;&amp; NameRef.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a2dc80c585ad5882da8cae7b5968f7e74">empty</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointerintpair">PointerIntPair&lt;DeclContext &#42;, 1&gt;</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We hash NameRef, which is the mangled name, in order to get most</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// overloaded functions resolve correctly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Strictly speaking, hashing the Tag is only necessary for a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DW&#95;TAG&#95;module, to prevent uniquing of a module and a namespace</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with the same name.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: dsymutil-classic won&#39;t unique the same type presented</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// once as a struct and once as a class. Using the Tag in the fully</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// qualified name hash to get the same effect.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Hash = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#add71474638430694c84640146383fc44">hash&#95;combine</a>(Context.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/declcontext/#a72e134b2c25154ec9c11a14fdc0c401b">getQualifiedNameHash</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343ac101058e7ea21bbbf2a5ac893088e90b">Tag</a>, NameRef);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: dsymutil-classic compatibility: when we don&#39;t have a name,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// use the filename.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsAnonymousNamespace)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Hash = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#add71474638430694c84640146383fc44">hash&#95;combine</a>(Hash, FileRef);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now look if this context already exists.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/declcontext">DeclContext</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a98c6256d0644613c6b5b3e2ef06ef5ce">Key</a>(Hash, Line, ByteSize, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343ac101058e7ea21bbbf2a5ac893088e90b">Tag</a>, NameRef, FileRef, Context);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ContextIter = Contexts.find(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a98c6256d0644613c6b5b3e2ef06ef5ce">Key</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ContextIter == Contexts.end()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The context wasn&#39;t found.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Inserted;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/declcontext">DeclContext</a> &#42;NewContext =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">new</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Allocator) <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/declcontext">DeclContext</a>(Hash, Line, ByteSize, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343ac101058e7ea21bbbf2a5ac893088e90b">Tag</a>, NameRef, FileRef,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                    Context, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a>, U.getUniqueID());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::tie(ContextIter, Inserted) = Contexts.insert(NewContext);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Inserted &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Failed to insert DeclContext&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    (void)Inserted;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343ac101058e7ea21bbbf2a5ac893088e90b">Tag</a> != dwarf::DW&#95;TAG&#95;namespace &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">             !(&#42;ContextIter)-&gt;setLastSeenDIE(U, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The context was found, but it is ambiguous with another context</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the same file. Mark it invalid.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointerintpair">PointerIntPair&lt;DeclContext &#42;, 1&gt;</a>(&#42;ContextIter, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42; IntVal= &#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(ContextIter != Contexts.end());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: dsymutil-classic compatibility. Union types aren&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// uniques, but their children might be.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343ac101058e7ea21bbbf2a5ac893088e90b">Tag</a> == dwarf::DW&#95;TAG&#95;subprogram &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">       Context.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/declcontext/#a8569ced4fce12d65531b73aa700486cb">getTag</a>() != dwarf::DW&#95;TAG&#95;structure&#95;type &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">       Context.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/declcontext/#a8569ced4fce12d65531b73aa700486cb">getTag</a>() != dwarf::DW&#95;TAG&#95;class&#95;type) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343ac101058e7ea21bbbf2a5ac893088e90b">Tag</a> == dwarf::DW&#95;TAG&#95;union&#95;type))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointerintpair">PointerIntPair&lt;DeclContext &#42;, 1&gt;</a>(&#42;ContextIter, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42; IntVal= &#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointerintpair">PointerIntPair&lt;DeclContext &#42;, 1&gt;</a>(&#42;ContextIter);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">DeclContextTree::getResolvedPath(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/compileunit">CompileUnit</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/cu">CU</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FileNum,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarfdebugline/linetable">DWARFDebugLine::LineTable</a> &amp;LineTable) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a98c6256d0644613c6b5b3e2ef06ef5ce">Key</a> = &#123;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/cu">CU</a>.getUniqueID(), FileNum&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ResolvedPathsMap::const&#95;iterator It = ResolvedPaths.find(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a98c6256d0644613c6b5b3e2ef06ef5ce">Key</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (It == ResolvedPaths.end()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::string FileName;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FoundFileName = LineTable.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarfdebugline/linetable/#a72aff7095112320360cc07670524728e">getFileNameByIndex</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">        FileNum, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/cu">CU</a>.getOrigUnit().getCompilationDir(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dilineinfospecifier/#a4d01b170267924ab4225e3c93ad666c3a7e2c85add6bbb98ae5b91471b11fd9a2">DILineInfoSpecifier::FileLineInfoKind::AbsoluteFilePath</a>, FileName);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">    (void)FoundFileName;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(FoundFileName &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Must get file name from line table&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Second level of caching, this time based on the file&#39;s parent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> ResolvedPath = PathResolver.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/cachedpathresolver/#a83dd2ec674ed050c3d4dd6f9541f8fd4">resolve</a>(FileName, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/stringpool">StringPool</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">    It = ResolvedPaths.insert(std::make&#95;pair(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a98c6256d0644613c6b5b3e2ef06ef5ce">Key</a>, ResolvedPath)).first;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> It-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>
